Html:
Hello,

My Goal is to create an "infinite" plot.

For examples, let's take the Hello World Sample. I want to get the values of the X axis as it is show to the user, so i can set an xmin and xmax for the user and plot the sinus.

And anytime he will change the x axis, i will get theses datas and plot again (the missing points) so the user see the plot everywhere.

Same thing if he zoom in or out

 

Is there a function to retrieve the max et the min value of Axis?

 

Thanks a lot, i really need it :)

Found the Solution

It's in plotter.Visible.X etc...

 

now i've a new problem, so new thread (improving the research of the forum)
